body.description: Keep your child protected & Dry on adventures with the weather Shield for single jogging strollers. Wind- and water-resistant, with air-flow vents for breathability. Designed for a tailored fit, It easily & securely attaches to stroller.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #12,893 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #31 in Baby Stroller Weather Shields

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's expensive but worth it
reviews.reviewText: It does a great job and exactly what it says. It keeps the rain, snow and even wind off of the baby. It's expensive but it does work. I've used it in the rain and snow and my son was nice and warm and dry. I definitely don't regret picking it up. I am curious though about how to properly clean the plastic because I feel like it's getting a little less clear over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We love this rain cover. It works great on the rain, and keeping the cold air out in the winter. We also love to use it when we make trips in the store or hospital to help keep germs off her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This seems to be a pretty high quality cover. It's definitely expensive, but the stroller and brand it goes on is quite expensive, so it's to be expected. We got this because our baby didn't like the winds, and especially the cold winter winds in South Dakota. Now, since we got this, we don't feel like we have to wait till it's warm out to take the baby for a walk. We just dress her up and put the cover down.I do wish the straps had some more adjustment to them, so you could get it fitted tighter, but otherwise no complaints at all. They just have velcro on the very ends of the straps, and it should be the whole way so you can get it tighter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish I had one of these...jealous of my baby!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my Bob stroller because it's getting cold where I live. I love this. It allows baby to not be so cold. It's easy to use once you know what you're doing. Baby doesn't seem to mind it being on the stroller either. I was worried about that because he likes to look around. Great purchase, hopefully I will get lots of walks and runs in with this as winter approaches!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Expensive, no zipper
reviews.reviewText: This cover fits the Bob Rambler - as it's designed to do, but doesn't have a zipper, which seems like a pretty big design flaw. In order to access your child, you'd have to take the rain cover off - and if it's raining, they would get wet in the process. There are less expensive options that include a zipper. They might not fit as well, but worth the tradeoff for me when thinking about the core functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must for the rain!
reviews.reviewText: If you live in a place with lots of rain, this is a must!!! I ordered this for a vacation where we were touristing nonstop and this weather shield kept our little guy happy and dry! I would recommend it 10 times over!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this incase we got caught in the rain, first time out after buying it we got caught in the rain. Little man stayed nice and dry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome cover for PNW
reviews.reviewText: This is a must have for rainy places like PNW for walks to school.It fits my old BOB Ironman stroller, but it’s not made for this, it’s made for the newer models. But it works decently enough. Provides good protection from the rain, good quality. Nice window, nice quality. The baby hates it, but too bad.Not easy to fold for storage, that I’ve figured yet.
Debated for a long time on this purchase, like most BOB gear, the price tag is heavy. BUT, it is excellent quality, and sturdy, like all other BOB gear. Fits our revolution perfectly, doesn't leak.
Fits great sleek design and very easy to install keeps your young one very dry from any weather. A little bit on the pricey side though

It took me forever to finally buy this because it’s so freaking expensive for a rain/weather cover but it fits perfectly and It’s well made. I’ve used it tons now and it does the job perfectly. He’s always dry, warm and it’s well ventilated (it never dogs up). I’ve been surprised hailed on and he was covered perfectly from it. I wish the top was also clear so you could see through the top of the stroller to check on him, but honestly you just check through the front it’s not that big of a deal. This thing is also fantastic at keeping him warm when it’s super windy. Blocks it out really well. Also it is so easy to put on and off and stores well in the stroller basket. If you’re going to invest in a BOB you might as well invest in this. I really don’t see a generic one doing as good of a job.

reviews.reviewTitle: Finally found a cover that fits my Schwinn jogger!
reviews.reviewText: I've just received this stroller winter shield. I did not try it outside yet but all what I can say is that I finally found a cover that fits my huge Schwinn Jogger and it looks great on it!I'll keep you posted on the effienciency..

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and perfect for cold temps
reviews.reviewText: This cover works perfectly for keeping the weather off the baby. We used it in -25 C winter and baby was cozy in the stroller with a blanket and didn't even notice the temps. Highly recommend
